Package eg.projects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Configurable
    The interface to configure a project.
    ProjectActions
    The interface to perform actions in a project.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HtmlActions
    Represents a project to write a webpage in HTML
    JavaActions
    Represents a programming project in Java.
    PerlActions
    Represents a programming project in Perl
    ProjectConfig
    Represents the configuration of a project.
    SelectedProject
    The selection and creation of an object of type ProjectActions
    SettingsWin
    The window for the configuration of a project
    TxtActions
    Represents a placeholder project that does not override any method of ProjectActions and that is defined for text files with extension '.txt'.
